text: The Group 14 elements, also known as the carbon group and the Group IV elements, is a group of elements on the periodic table. Each element has 4 valence electrons. Only carbon makes anions. Silicon and germanium are semimetals. Tin and lead are poor metals. Flerovium, a radioactive element, is not stable enough to see its properties. All of them can form +4 oxidation state compounds. Tin and lead can form +2 compounds, too. File:Carbon black.jpg|Carbon File:Silicon.jpg|Silicon File:Germanium.jpg|Germanium File:Tin-2.jpg|Tin File:Lead.jpg|Lead Group 14 elements
title: Group 14 element
